# Blog Post Publishing Checklist

Use this checklist before publishing each post to ensure quality and consistency.

## Pre-Writing
- [ ] Topic selected and researched
- [ ] Outline created
- [ ] Code examples tested
- [ ] Resources gathered

## Content
- [ ] Clear, specific title
- [ ] Compelling excerpt (1-2 sentences)
- [ ] Strong introduction (hook + what/why)
- [ ] Well-structured sections (h2/h3)
- [ ] Practical code examples with comments
- [ ] Real-world scenarios included
- [ ] Key takeaways summarized
- [ ] Strong conclusion with call-to-action

## Front Matter
- [ ] Layout set to `post`
- [ ] Title is descriptive and SEO-friendly
- [ ] Date and time set correctly
- [ ] 1-3 relevant categories chosen
- [ ] 5-10 specific tags added
- [ ] Author name included
- [ ] Excerpt written (appears in listings)

## Code Quality
- [ ] All code examples tested and working
- [ ] Syntax highlighting language specified
- [ ] Comments added for clarity

## Local Testing
- [ ] Previewed locally
- [ ] Formatting renders correctly
- [ ] Images display properly
- [ ] Links work

## Pre-Publish
- [ ] One final proofread
- [ ] Check publication date is correct
- [ ] Commit with clear message
- [ ] Push to GitHub

**Quality over quantity!**
